Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie O'Donnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor.(n)

programme.title: Rock Dog
programme.desc: A wide-eyed hound leaves his village home to pursue his rock star dream in the big city. Animated family adventure, featuring the voices of Luke Wilson, Eddie Izzard and JK Simmons.(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets
programme.desc: When rivalry leaves them cast adrift on the streets of New York, two bickering hounds must put their differences aside and pull together. Animated adventure from the makers of Despicable Me, featuring the voices of Louis CK, Eric Stonestreet and Kevin Hart.(n)

programme.title: Pete's Dragon
programme.desc: A young boy orphaned by a car crash and left alone in a forest befriends a giant, fire-breathing dragon. Fantasy adventure, starring Bryce Dallas Howard, Robert Redford and Oakes Fegley.(n)

programme.title: An Eskimo Tale
programme.desc: When animals start mysteriously disappearing, three young Inuits embark on a perilous journey to save their tribe from ruin. Animated adventure, with the voice of Christopher Plummer.(n)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Dark Side of Dimensions
programme.desc: The stakes have rarely been higher and the rivalries never as fierce as Yugi Muto and rival Seto Kaiba return for an epic battle. Animated adventure, with the voices of Dan Green, Eric Stuart and Wayne Grayson.(n)

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte.(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets
programme.desc: When rivalry leaves them cast adrift on the streets of New York, two bickering hounds must put their differences aside and pull together. Animated adventure from the makers of Despicable Me, featuring the voices of Louis CK, Eric Stonestreet and Kevin Hart.(n)

programme.title: Rock Dog
programme.desc: A wide-eyed hound leaves his village home to pursue his rock star dream in the big city. Animated family adventure, featuring the voices of Luke Wilson, Eddie Izzard and JK Simmons.(n)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
programme.desc: Lucy and Edmund Pevensie return to the magical world accompanied by their selfish cousin. They join their old friend King Caspian as he sets sail across the sea in search of seven of his father's allies who had been banished years before, but along the way they discover an evil force is growing in strength. Fantasy adventure, with Georgie Henley, Skandar Keynes, Will Poulter and Ben Barnes.(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Young courting couples Fred and Wilma, and Barney and Betty are invited to stay at a luxury casino in the Stone Age gambling capital. Owner Chip Rockefeller is bent on stopping Fred proposing to wealthy Wilma, because he wants to marry her himself for the money and settle his debts. Family comedy prequel, with Mark Addy, Stephen Baldwin, Joan Collins, Alan Cumming, Kristen Johnston and Jane Krakowski.(n)

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A private eye is recruited by a group of Buddhist mystics and sent on a mission to rescue an abducted boy whose supernatural powers will enable him to bring about world peace. However, the kidnapper is actually a demon in human form, determined to ensure the youngster does not fulfil his destiny. Comedy fantasy adventure, starring Eddie Murphy, Charles Dance and Charlotte Lewis.(n)

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: A philosophy-reading kung fu expert gains a reputation as the best bouncer around, and is hired by the owner of a rowdy Missouri bar to keep the peace. When he fires some of the establishment's corrupt staff, he incurs the wrath of a local crime boss who has a stranglehold on the town's businesses. Action thriller, starring Patrick Swayze, Ben Gazzara, Kelly Lynch, Sam Elliott and blues singer Jeff Healey.

programme.title: Single White Female
programme.desc: Software designer Allison is looking for a flatmate and seems to have struck lucky with shy applicant Hedra. However, Allison soon comes to realise her new friend is dangerously obsessed with her, and when she plans a reconciliation with her former boyfriend, a jealous Hedra becomes increasingly unhinged. Psychological thriller, with Bridget Fonda, Jennifer Jason Leigh, and Steven Weber.

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: After being abducted by a kidnapper with multiple personalities, three young women are soon engaged in a fight for survival. Meanwhile, an oblivious psychiatrist tries to ease her patient's fractured mind as a 24th character attempts to dominate his body. M Night Shyamalan's thriller, starring James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy and Betty Buckley.

programme.title: Anon
programme.desc: In a world without anonymity or crime, a detective meets a woman who threatens their security. Sci-fi thriller from Gattaca and In Time director Andrew Niccol, starring Clive Owen, Amanda Seyfried and Colm Feore.

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: A crook double-crosses his partners in crime, a betrayal that leaves their friend and mentor dead. One year later, they regroup and come up with a daring plan to exact revenge on the traitor and reclaim their ill-gotten gains. Crime thriller inspired by the 1969 movie, starring Mark Wahlberg, Charlize Theron, Edward Norton, Seth Green and Donald Sutherland.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: When the commander of his old military unit is arrested on trumped-up spy charges, vigilante Jack Reacher investigates. Action sequel, starring Tom Cruise, Cobie Smulders and Danika Yarosh.

programme.title: Inconceivable
programme.desc: A mother looks to escape her abusive past by moving to a new town. There she befriends another mother, who grows suspicious of her. Thriller, starring Gina Gershon, Faye Dunaway and Nicolas Cage.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: The laid-back lifestyle of an arrogant New York playboy is shattered when his unstable girlfriend drives off a bridge with him in the car. Although he survives, he struggles to put his life back together in the face of a series of strange events. Cameron Crowe's remake of Spanish thriller Open Your Eyes, starring Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell, Jason Lee and Penelope Cruz, who also appeared in the original.

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: Two marines based in Cuba stand accused of murdering a comrade-in-arms. Three Navy lawyers working on their defence unearth evidence that the soldiers may have been acting under orders, which points to a trail of corruption leading all the way to a top-ranking officer. Drama based on Aaron Sorkin's stage play, starring Tom Cruise, Demi Moore, Kevin Pollack, Jack Nicholson, Kiefer Sutherland and Kevin Bacon.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: When the commander of his old military unit is arrested on trumped-up spy charges, vigilante Jack Reacher investigates. Action sequel, starring Tom Cruise, Cobie Smulders and Danika Yarosh.

programme.title: Shot Caller
programme.desc: An ex con is forced by the leaders of his gang to orchestrate a major crime with a brutal rival squad on the streets of Southern California. Crime drama, starring Jon Bernthal, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau and Lake Bell.

programme.title: Death Wish
programme.desc: A family man takes the law into his own hands when his wife is murdered and his daughter is left psychologically traumatised by thugs. Setting out on a one-man crusade to rid the streets of crime, he becomes a hero to the people - and a thorn in the side of the authorities. Vigilante thriller, starring Charles Bronson, Hope Lange and Vincent Gardenia.

programme.title: The French Connection
programme.desc: Two tough New York cops use unorthodox methods to try to break an international drug ring. When their information leads them to place a candy store under surveillance, they discover the owners are the American agents for a French kingpin planning to ship millions of dollars worth of heroin into the US. Oscar-winning fact-based thriller, starring Gene Hackman, Roy Scheider, Fernando Rey and Tony Lo Bianco.

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos.

programme.title: Come And Find Me
programme.desc: A man's desperate search for his missing girlfriend takes him down an increasingly dark and dangerous path. Mystery thriller, starring Aaron Paul, Annabelle Wallis and Garret Dillahunt.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: A doctor's wife recovering from a car accident is troubled by terrifying visions of a ghostly girl who seems to be asking for help from beyond the grave. While her husband thinks the experiences are the result of her recent trauma, a psychiatrist urges her to communicate with the spirit. Supernatural thriller, starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Harrison Ford, Diana Scarwid and Joe Morton.

programme.title: Allied
programme.desc: A daring Canadian intelligence officer falls for a beautiful French resistance fighter during the Second World War. When they reunite in London, their relationship is tested by the pressures of conflict. Epic Robert Zemeckis thriller, starring Brad Pitt, Marion Cotillard and Jared Harris.

programme.title: The Warriors
programme.desc: A New York gang leader calls together all the gangs in the city, with the intention of uniting them. However, when he is assassinated, one of the groups he was hoping to draw into his alliance is framed for the murder, and finds all the others have turned on it. A battle for survival to make it back to their own turf alive ensues. Action adventure, starring Michael Beck and James Remar.

programme.title: The Infiltrator
programme.desc: During the 1980s, a chameleonic US agent faces one of the most dangerous assignments of his life when he infiltrates the intricate criminal network of drug kingpin Pablo Escobar. Drama, starring Bryan Cranston, John Leguizamo and Diane Kruger.

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: A quadriplegic ex-cop is saved from the brink of suicide by a rookie female officer needing his expertise to form a psychological profile of a serial killer. The murderer is posing as a cab driver and terrorising Manhattan, and has a gruesome habit of taking trophies from his victims' bodies. Thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Angelina Jolie, Michael Rooker, Mike McGlone, Luis Guzman and Queen Latifah.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A driverless train carrying a deadly cargo of toxic chemicals goes out of control. A veteran train operator and his rookie colleague set off in pursuit in their own locomotive, intending to bring it to a halt before it crashes and causes a major disaster. Action thriller, the final film from director Tony Scott, starring Denzel Washington, Chris Pine and Rosario Dawson.

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 123
programme.desc: Criminals hijack a crowded New York subway train and threaten to start shooting the passengers unless a $10million ransom is paid in one hour. However, the transport supervisor they issue their demands to begins to suspect the plot is part of an even grander scheme. Tony Scott's thriller remake, with Denzel Washington and John Travolta.

programme.title: Money Train
programme.desc: A New York cop in debt to loan sharks persuades his foster brother and fellow police officer to rob a train carrying all the day's takings from the city's subway network. However, things start to go wrong when a female detective creates rivalry between the pair, and a pyromaniac serial killer threatens their plans. Action comedy, starring Woody Harrelson, Wesley Snipes, Jennifer Lopez and Chris Cooper.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: The story of 1970s drug kingpin Frank Lucas, whose innovative methods of smuggling heroin into the US made him one of the leading figures in the New York underworld. A detective is assigned to bring Lucas's empire down, but his investigation is undermined by police corruption. Ridley Scott's fact-based crime drama, starring Denzel Washington, Russell Crowe, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Josh Brolin.(n)

programme.title: Freehold
programme.desc: Fast-talking estate agent Hussein finds his personal and professional life unravelling as a wronged former client takes his revenge. Comedy horror, starring Javier Botet, Mandeep Dhillon and Mim Shaikh.(n)

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster.(n)

programme.title: Miller's Crossing
programme.desc: A Mob boss watches as his empire crumbles around him after he refuses to have his girlfriend's brother killed. A disgruntled henchman responds by heading up a breakaway criminal faction, while the boss's right-hand man tries to decide where his loyalties lie. The Coen brothers' Prohibition-era gangster thriller, starring Gabriel Byrne, Albert Finney, Marcia Gay Harden and John Turturro.(n)

programme.title: Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps
programme.desc: Ruthless stockbroker Gordon Gekko is released from prison after eight years, reinventing himself as an author and lecturer warning against the dangers of the financial system. Gekko helps a young banker get revenge on the company that drove his mentor to suicide, but as always, has a crooked agenda of his own. Oliver Stone's sequel to his 1980s drama, with Michael Douglas, Shia LaBeouf and Carey Mulligan.(n)

programme.title: Nocturnal Animals
programme.desc: An art gallery owner is tormented by the violent thriller penned by ex-husband. Tom Ford's psychological thriller, starring Amy Adams, Jake Gyllenhaal and Michael Shannon.(n)

programme.title: Live by Night
programme.desc: A group of Boston-bred gangsters set up shop in balmy Florida during the Prohibition era, facing off against the competition and the Ku Klux Klan. Crime drama, directed by and starring Ben Affleck, with Elle Fanning, Remo Girone and Brendan Gleeson.(n)

programme.title: Kidulthood
programme.desc: West London teenagers face difficult choices that could affect the rest of their lives, as they struggle to deal with the effects of gun crime, drugs and bullying in their impoverished neighbourhood. Drama, written by and starring Noel Clarke, with Aml Ameen, Red Madrell, Jaime Winstone and Rafe Spall.(n)

programme.title: Safe House
programme.desc: A CIA agent stationed in South Africa is sent to question a rogue operative, who has been arrested years after betraying the agency, only to be attacked by mercenaries hired to capture the fugitive. As they flee for their lives, the interrogator has to contend with not only the enemies hunting them, but also the mind games of his prisoner. Thriller, with Denzel Washington and Ryan Reynolds.(n)

programme.title: Mean Machine
programme.desc: A disgraced soccer star jailed for assaulting two policemen is persuaded by the prison authorities to form a football team of inmates to take on the guards. Unfortunately, whipping his fellow prisoners into shape proves a tricky proposition. Comedy drama, starring Vinnie Jones, Jason Statham, David Hemmings and Jason Flemyng.(n)

programme.title: Brawl In Cell Block 99
programme.desc: A former boxer is blackmailed into performing a prison hit by a ruthless drug kingpin. Crime thriller, starring Vince Vaughn, Jennifer Carpenter and Don Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Cape Fear
programme.desc: A psychopathic rapist is released from prison after 14 years and plots revenge on the defence attorney he blames for his imprisonment. Subjecting the lawyer and his family to a terrifying campaign of intimidation, he uses his knowledge of the law to stay untouchable. Martin Scorsese's thriller remake, starring Robert De Niro, Nick Nolte, Jessica Lange and Juliette Lewis, with cameo appearances by Gregory Peck, Robert Mitchum and Martin Balsam, who all appeared in the 1962 original.(n)

programme.title: Highlander
programme.desc: A 16th-century Scottish clansman discovers he is one of a race of immortal warriors who can only be killed by beheading, and who are destined to fight to the death until just one survives. Centuries later in modern-day New York, he prepares for a final showdown with his deadliest enemy. Fantasy action adventure, starring Christopher Lambert, Sean Connery, Clancy Brown and Roxanne Hart. Featuring a soundtrack by Queen.

programme.title: Willow
programme.desc: A farmer with dreams of becoming a wizard finds an abandoned baby, who is destined to bring about the downfall of an evil queen. The wicked tyrant's minions have been sent to kill the child before she can fulfil the prophecy, and it falls to the would-be sorcerer to protect her, with the aid of a rogue warrior. Fantasy adventure, starring Warwick Davis and Val Kilmer.

programme.title: Titan AE
programme.desc: In the year 3038, an alien race has annihilated almost all of mankind and destroyed the Earth. A scientist escapes the planet on board a craft that is destined to be humanity's only chance of future survival - the spaceship Titan. Fourteen years later, his estranged son plucks up courage and sets out on a perilous journey to find the ship and reunite with his father. Animated sci-fi adventure, with the voices of Matt Damon, Bill Pullman and Drew Barrymore.

programme.title: Shin Godzilla
programme.desc: Japan is plunged into chaos upon the appearance of a giant monster. Fantasy adventure, starring Hiroki Hasegawa, Yutaka Takenouchi and Satomi Ishihara.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A reckless slacker joins the Navy, hoping to win the respect of his girlfriend's father, a stern admiral. He and his shipmates are put to the ultimate test as part of a force of vessels that must battle an invading fleet of powerful alien spaceships. Sci-fi adventure, starring Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgard.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: A young lad is transported to a parallel universe where he is caught in a battle between a mysterious gunslinger and a sinister sorcerer. Fantasy adventure based on the Stephen King novels, starring Idris Elba, Matthew McConaughey and Tom Taylor.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: A team of scientists on the International Space Station fight for survival when an intelligent alien life form is brought on board. The creature, nicknamed Calvin, proves it will do anthing to stay alive, and the crew risk everything to ensure it does not make its way to Earth. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Rebecca Ferguson, Ryan Reynolds and Ariyon Bakare.

programme.title: Shin Godzilla
programme.desc: Japan is plunged into chaos upon the appearance of a giant monster. Fantasy adventure, starring Hiroki Hasegawa, Yutaka Takenouchi and Satomi Ishihara.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A reckless slacker joins the Navy, hoping to win the respect of his girlfriend's father, a stern admiral. He and his shipmates are put to the ultimate test as part of a force of vessels that must battle an invading fleet of powerful alien spaceships. Sci-fi adventure, starring Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgard.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: A young lad is transported to a parallel universe where he is caught in a battle between a mysterious gunslinger and a sinister sorcerer. Fantasy adventure based on the Stephen King novels, starring Idris Elba, Matthew McConaughey and Tom Taylor.

programme.title: Patient Seven
programme.desc: A renowned psychiatrist selects six mentally ill hospital patients to interview as part of research for his new book, and discovers one patient is connected to them all. Horror anthology, starring Michael Ironside, Jack Plotnick and Drew Fonteiro.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: A team of scientists on the International Space Station fight for survival when an intelligent alien life form is brought on board. The creature, nicknamed Calvin, proves it will do anthing to stay alive, and the crew risk everything to ensure it does not make its way to Earth. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Rebecca Ferguson, Ryan Reynolds and Ariyon Bakare.

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: The sinister criminal Jigsaw is preparing to mete out his deranged and sadistic form of justice on more hapless victims. Meanwhile, a cop is desperately searching for the madman and the gruesome prison where he is holding eight terrified strangers. Horror sequel, starring Tobin Bell, Donnie Wahlberg, Shawnee Smith and Franky G.

programme.title: Titan AE
programme.desc: In the year 3038, an alien race has annihilated almost all of mankind and destroyed the Earth. A scientist escapes the planet on board a craft that is destined to be humanity's only chance of future survival - the spaceship Titan. Fourteen years later, his estranged son plucks up courage and sets out on a perilous journey to find the ship and reunite with his father. Animated sci-fi adventure, with the voices of Matt Damon, Bill Pullman and Drew Barrymore.

programme.title: The Girl with All the Gifts
programme.desc: A scientist and a teacher living in a dystopian future embark on a journey of survival with a young girl named Melanie. Horror thriller, starring Gemma Arterton, Paddy Considine, Glenn Close and Sennia Nanua.

programme.title: The Unseen
programme.desc: A sawmill worker with a mysterious condition that's slowly turning him invisible must risk everything to find his missing daughter. Dark sci-fi drama, starring Aden Young, Camille Sullivan and Julia Sarah Stone.

programme.title: Avengers Assemble
programme.desc: A mystical artefact is stolen from a top-secret military base by Thor's brother Loki, who plans to use it to bring about an alien invasion. Spymaster Nick Fury brings together a team of superheroes, including Iron Man, Thor, Captain America and the Hulk, to defend Earth from the impending attack. Action adventure uniting the Marvel comic-book characters, starring Robert Downey Jr, Chris Evans, Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Scarlett Johansson, Tom Hiddleston, Jeremy Renner and Samuel L Jackson.

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Caesar and his apes are forced into a lethal clash with an army of humans led by a ruthless colonel. Fantasy adventure, starring Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn.

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: A trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who is not as helpless as he seems, and their hopes of walking away with a massive fortune do not go to plan. Horror, starring Stephen Lang, Jane Levy and Dylan Minnette.

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: Horror sequel, starring Vera Farmiga and Patrick Wilson. Paranormal investigators battle sinister supernatural forces in London.

programme.title: The Girl with All the Gifts
programme.desc: A scientist and a teacher living in a dystopian future embark on a journey of survival with a young girl named Melanie. Horror thriller, starring Gemma Arterton, Paddy Considine, Glenn Close and Sennia Nanua.

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Caesar and his apes are forced into a lethal clash with an army of humans led by a ruthless colonel. Fantasy adventure, starring Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn.

programme.title: Avengers Assemble
programme.desc: A mystical artefact is stolen from a top-secret military base by Thor's brother Loki, who plans to use it to bring about an alien invasion. Spymaster Nick Fury brings together a team of superheroes, including Iron Man, Thor, Captain America and the Hulk, to defend Earth from the impending attack. Action adventure uniting the Marvel comic-book characters, starring Robert Downey Jr, Chris Evans, Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Scarlett Johansson, Tom Hiddleston, Jeremy Renner and Samuel L Jackson.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: A sinister alien parasite brings out the web-slinging hero's darker side, filling him with thoughts of revenge on his uncle's murderer, the shape-shifting Sandman. Meanwhile, he also has to contend with the challenge of his best friend following in his father's villainous footsteps - and a jealous rival developing superpowers of his own. Superhero sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst and James Franco.(n)

programme.title: Project: ALF
programme.desc: A lovable alien is captured by the US army who plan to destroy him, prompting two officers to come to his aid. Spin-off from the sci-fi comedy TV series, with Miguel Ferrer, Ed Begley Jr and Martin Sheen.(n)

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet malfunctions. As woken travelling companions Jim Preston and Aurora Lane fall in love, they are soon on a collision course with more technical problems and a dark secret. Fantasy adventure, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt and Michael Sheen.(n)

programme.title: The Adjustment Bureau
programme.desc: A politician is attracted to a dancer he meets at a pivotal moment in his life, but finds his every effort to get to know her is thwarted by a group of mysterious men. He realises these shadowy figures are manipulating him and moving him toward a predetermined fate, which he resolves to fight. Sci-fi thriller, starring Matt Damon and Emily Blunt.(n)

programme.title: Blade Runner: Theatrical Version
programme.desc: A former cop in a bleak future Los Angeles is forced to return to duty for a mission to hunt down and kill a group of renegade android replicants. The fugitives have escaped from a space colony to find their creator on Earth, in a bid to prolong their limited lifespan. Ridley Scott's sci-fi thriller, in the cut originally released in cinemas, Starring Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young and Daryl Hannah.(n)

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: Premiere. An android-hunter's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former detective Rick Deckard, who's been missing for 30 years. Denis Villeneuve's Oscar-winning sci-fi thriller, starring Ryan Gosling, Harrison Ford and Jared Leto.(n)

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet malfunctions. As woken travelling companions Jim Preston and Aurora Lane fall in love, they are soon on a collision course with more technical problems and a dark secret. Fantasy adventure, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt and Michael Sheen.(n)

programme.title: The Adjustment Bureau
programme.desc: A politician is attracted to a dancer he meets at a pivotal moment in his life, but finds his every effort to get to know her is thwarted by a group of mysterious men. He realises these shadowy figures are manipulating him and moving him toward a predetermined fate, which he resolves to fight. Sci-fi thriller, starring Matt Damon and Emily Blunt.(n)

programme.title: Blade Runner: Theatrical Version
programme.desc: A former cop in a bleak future Los Angeles is forced to return to duty for a mission to hunt down and kill a group of renegade android replicants. The fugitives have escaped from a space colony to find their creator on Earth, in a bid to prolong their limited lifespan. Ridley Scott's sci-fi thriller, in the cut originally released in cinemas, Starring Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young and Daryl Hannah.(n)

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: Premiere. An android-hunter's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former detective Rick Deckard, who's been missing for 30 years. Denis Villeneuve's Oscar-winning sci-fi thriller, starring Ryan Gosling, Harrison Ford and Jared Leto.(n)

programme.title: Carnage Park
programme.desc: Two criminals take a woman hostage and flee into the backwoods following a disastrous bank robbery. What should have been a safe haven proves a far greater threat than the cops on their trail when they stray into the territory of a former military sniper driven by his experiences of war and who does not take kindly to strangers on his land. Horror, starring Ashley Bell and Pat Healy.

programme.title: Excision
programme.desc: A disturbed teenage girl is a social outcast at her school and harbours twisted fantasies about performing surgery on her classmates. She becomes desperate to win her mother's approval and goes to insane lengths to prove her worth, while also striving to cure her sister's cystic fibrosis. Comedy horror, starring AnnaLynne McCord, Traci Lords and Malcolm McDowell.

programme.title: Mr Popper's Penguins
programme.desc: A workaholic businessman always puts his job before his family until he receives an unexpected inheritance from his explorer father - six penguins. He abandons his plan to offload the birds to a zoo when he finds his kids love them, and sets about turning his New York apartment into a suitable habitat. Family comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Carla Gugino and Angela Lansbury.(c)

programme.title: Sicario Interview Special
programme.desc: Emily Blunt and Benicio Del Toro join director Denis Villeneuve to talk about the making of their drug-cartel drama Sicario.(c)

programme.title: The Jewel of the Nile
programme.desc: A novelist travels to the Middle East to become a sheik's official biographer, only to end up being held hostage by him. Her lover joins forces with an old enemy to rescue her, but they get drawn into the hunt for a mysterious ancient treasure that has a connection to an eccentric holy man. Comedy adventure sequel to Romancing the Stone, starring Michael Douglas, Kathleen Turner and Danny DeVito.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: A clumsy Viking boy longs to become a mighty dragon slayer and protect his village from the fearsome flying lizards, but his father thinks he is not up to the task. However, when he sets out to prove his worth, he ends up befriending a dragon, and realises his people may have misjudged the creatures. Animated fantasy, with the voices of Jay Baruchel and Gerard Butler.

programme.title: Night at the Museum
programme.desc: A new nightwatchman at New York's Museum of Natural History discovers his job entails more than he bargained for. Once night falls, an ancient Egyptian spell brings the museum exhibits to life, entangling him in a riotous struggle to restore peace and order before the sun rises and visitors arrive. Fantasy comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Dick Van Dyke, Robin Williams, Carla Gugino and Ricky Gervais.

programme.title: The Cold Light of Day
programme.desc: A man on a sailing holiday in Spain discovers his family have been abducted. His search for them leads him to learn that his father has been leading a double-life as a CIA agent, and has stolen top-secret information - which the kidnappers will stop at nothing to obtain. Thriller, starring Henry Cavill, Bruce Willis and Sigourney Weaver.

programme.title: Lone Survivor
programme.desc: Four American soldiers are sent on a mission into the mountains of Afghanistan to track down and eliminate a high-ranking terrorist leader. They soon find themselves faced with a terrible moral dilemma and a battle for survival against overwhelming odds. Fact-based drama, starring Mark Wahlberg, Taylor Kitsch, Emile Hirsch and Ben Foster.

programme.title: Battle: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The Earth is bombarded by what appear to be meteors, but turn out to be the vanguard of an alien invasion force. As America's west coast comes under heavy attack, a platoon of soldiers is sent in to fight off the aliens and rescue civilians - but the troops have only a few hours to complete their mission before the area is bombed. Sci-fi thriller, with Aaron Eckhart and Ramon Rodriguez.

programme.title: Quadrophenia
programme.desc: A teenager in 1960s London is unhappy with his lot in life, but believes he has found a place to belong in the mod subculture and their feud with the rival rockers. As the mods gather in Brighton for a weekend that turns to violence, his naive vision of the world is cruelly shattered. Drama based on the Who album, starring Phil Daniels, Leslie Ash, Sting and Ray Winstone.(c)

programme.title: BSL Zone
programme.sub-title: BSL Zone: Close Up: Terry Riley
programme.desc: Programmes about Terry Riley, retiring Chair of the British Deaf Association and deaf TV pioneer.(c)

programme.title: Beau Geste
programme.desc: Three brothers are accused of stealing from their aristocratic adopted mother. They seek to salvage their honour by joining the Foreign Legion, battling a rampaging Arab army as well as coming into conflict with their sadistic commanding officer. Action adventure, starring Gary Cooper, Ray Milland, Robert Preston and Brian Donlevy.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: One-eyed, over-the-hill US Marshal Rooster Cogburn reluctantly agrees to help a girl track down her father's killer. The quest is complicated by a Texas Ranger, who is also on the murderer's trail, and a host of villains who have few qualms about disposing of the meddling youngster and her protector. Western, starring an Oscar-winning John Wayne alongside Jeff Corey, Kim Darby, Glen Campbell, Robert Duvall and Dennis Hopper.

programme.title: The Comancheros
programme.desc: A hard-bitten Texas Ranger joins forces with a convict and a gambler in a covert operation to run a gang of gunmen out of the territory for supplying Comanche warriors with arms and alcohol from a secret hideout in Mexico. But after infiltrating the renegades' secret camp, they have to figure out how to survive until help arrives. Western, with John Wayne, Stuart Whitman, Ina Balin, Nehemiah Persoff and Lee Marvin.

programme.title: The Abyss
programme.desc: An American nuclear submarine is sunk after a collision with a mysterious object, and the US government asks oil workers to help with the rescue. However, when they and a Navy Seal team arrive at the location of the vessel, a series of strange incidents leads to an encounter with aliens living in the depths. James Cameron's sci-fi thriller, starring Ed Harris, Michael Biehn and Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio.

programme.title: Sicario
programme.desc: An FBI agent is recruited to join an elite government task force based on the border between the US and Mexico, charged with preventing drugs being smuggled into the country. The team is sent on a secret mission, and the new recruit is forced to question everything she believes in order to survive. Crime drama, starring Emily Blunt, Josh Brolin and Benicio Del Toro.

programme.title: Sicario 2: Soldado Exclusive Preview
programme.desc: An exclusive extended clip from Sicario 2: Soldado, the action-thriller sequel to Sicario, which sees two characters from the original film reuniting to initiate a new mission.

programme.title: Legion
programme.desc: The Archangel Michael turns his back on Heaven and travels to a small-town diner to protect a pregnant waitress and her unborn child from God's wrath. Action fantasy, starring Paul Bettany, Dennis Quaid, Lucas Black, Tyrese Gibson, Adrianne Palicki and Willa Holland.

programme.title: American Reunion
programme.desc: Jim Levenstein and his old friends return to their home town for a high-school reunion. Struck by how much their lives have changed, they set out to relive the sexual misadventures of their adolescence, but only end up making bigger fools of themselves than they did as teenagers. Comedy sequel to the American Pie movies, starring Jason Biggs and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: The Wonderful Country
programme.desc: A solitary gunman lies low for years in Mexico hiding out from the American authorities, until circumstances force him to return to the US - where he reluctantly agrees to take on dangerous work with a team of Texas Rangers patrolling the border. Western, starring Robert Mitchum, Julie London, Pedro Armendariz and Jack Oakie.(n)

programme.title: Posse from Hell
programme.desc: Bandits invade a frontier town, rob the bank, kill the sheriff and kidnap a local woman. A tough gunslinger who was a friend of the dead lawman takes on the job of bringing them to justice, but the only one of the townspeople willing to help is a naive banker determined to prove his worth. Western, starring Audie Murphy, John Saxon, Vic Morrow and Lee Van Cleef.(n)

programme.title: The Professionals
programme.desc: A wealthy Texan hires four mercenaries to rescue his wife, who has been abducted and taken to Mexico by a bandit gang. However, when they find her, she refuses to leave and they have to take her by force - ending in a cross-border chase with the outlaws on their trail. Western adventure, with Burt Lancaster, Lee Marvin, Robert Ryan, Woody Strode, Jack Palance and Claudia Cardinale.(n)

programme.title: Winchester '73
programme.desc: A gunslinger tracks down his father's killer, but is unable to exact his revenge because the sheriff of the town makes a point of confiscating all firearms. Instead he challenges him to compete in a shooting competition to win a superb rifle, but when the murderer loses, he steals the coveted prize. Western, starring James Stewart, Shelley Winters, Dan Duryea and Stephen McNally.(n)

programme.title: X-Men: The Last Stand
programme.desc: The mutant heroes return to face a battle on three fronts. Arch-enemy Magneto is back with an army of followers, while a corporation has created a drug that permanently robs mutants of their powers. Meanwhile, their former ally Jean Grey has returned from the dead as the destructive and seemingly unstoppable Phoenix. The third instalment of the superhero saga, starring Hugh Jackman, Ian McKellen, Famke Janssen, Halle Berry and Kelsey Grammer.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: A gang of fugitives is reunited by an FBI manhunter, who offers the criminals pardons in return for their help. They must go to Europe and bring down a criminal syndicate led by a ruthless London gangster, whose right-hand woman is an old friend of theirs assumed to be dead. Action thriller sequel, with Vin Diesel, Dwayne Johnson and Michelle Rodriguez.(n)

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: A rancher seizes the chance to settle his debts and earn his son's respect by agreeing to escort a notorious outlaw to the town of Contention, where a train will take the prisoner to jail. But the journey takes a dangerous turn when the criminal tries to manipulate the rancher into letting him go - while his henchmen lie in wait. Western remake, starring Russell Crowe, Christian Bale and Gretchen Mol.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A wealthy widow, Mrs Clayborne, accuses John-Boy of stealing silver antiques while working in her mansion. John needs new truck tyres so hocks his wedding ring to buy them. Richard Thomas stars.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A widow enlists John-Boy's help in her efforts to win the affections of a farm worker who is hoping to settle down.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: There's No Place Like Home - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. The Ingalls, Oleson and Garvey families get tired of the bustling city life and decide to return to Walnut Grove, where a shock awaits them.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: There's No Place Like Home - Part Two
programme.desc: Part two of two. The residents of Walnut Grove work hard to restore the town to its former glory for founder Lars Hanson, who the Ingalls family discovers has been crippled by a stroke. Drama, starring Michael Landon, Karen Grassle and Melissa Gilbert.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Sydney eagerly anticipates taking her relationship with dishy Dr Marcus to the next level, but bargains without his deep, dark secret. Jim and Robbie cook up a plan to prevent a pig mascot becoming the first course at a company dinner and Joanie considers marketing her chowder.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Sydney becomes increasingly involved in the life of a troublesome teenager who has run away from her foster home, while Joanie receives overtures from a major food retailer eager to market her chowder.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jim-Bob graduates from high school just as the Allied Forces invade France. He joins his three brothers as all of them march off for duty overseas. Erin learns Ashley has got married in London.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part one of two. John writes to the president for help when Harley is arrested for a crime he committed many years earlier.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part two of two. John writes to the president for help when Harley is arrested for a crime he committed many years ago.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Mary Ellen is frustrated that Walton's Mountain no longer has a doctor, so decides to solve the problem by training as one herself.

programme.title: Loving Evangeline
programme.desc: A software executive returns to his boyhood home in Nova Scotia to investigate the mysterious death of his brother in a boating incident, and joins forces with a local widow who believes the tragedy was not accidental. Romantic thriller, starring Nick Mancuso, Kelly Rowan, Karl Bury and Winston Reckert.

programme.title: King of the World
programme.desc: The early career of boxer Muhammad Ali, then known as Cassius Clay, as he prepares for a title fight against Sonny Liston, while struggling to come to terms with his private and public personas. Biopic, starring Terrence Howard, Steve Harris, Gary Dourdan and John Ventimiglia.

programme.title: The Scarlet and the Black
programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama about Monsignor Hugh O'Flaherty, a cleric who rescued thousands of PoWs and Italian resistance fighters from the Gestapo. Starring Gregory Peck, Christopher Plummer and John Gielgud.

programme.title: Savannah
programme.desc: A plantation owner in the early 20th century rejects his privileged background in favour of living off the land alongside a freed slave, supporting himself by hunting. When he falls in love with a high-society woman, he is forced to choose between her and his freedom. Fact-based period drama, starring Jim Caviezel, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Jaimie Alexander.

programme.title: United
programme.desc: Feature-length drama charting the story of the `Busby Babes' - the Manchester United side who became the youngest-ever winners of the English Football League in 1956. Having won the league again in 1957, the team reaches the quarter-finals of the European Cup in 1958 - but disaster strikes as they return from the match in Belgrade, when their charter plane crashes following a refuelling stop in Munich. The disaster claims the lives of 23 people, including eight players - and with manager Matt Busby in a critical condition, coach Jimmy Murphy tries to rebuild the shattered team. Starring David Tennant, Jack O'Connell, Sam Claflin and Dougray Scott.

programme.title: Passchendaele
programme.desc: A Canadian soldier is injured in battle during the First World War, and falls for a nurse in the hospital. Declared unfit for duty due to ill health, he is reassigned to a recruitment station - but he tricks his way back to the front line to protect the brother of the woman he loves. Drama, directed by and starring Paul Gross. With Caroline Dhavernas and Joe Dinicol.

programme.title: The Man Who Saved the World
programme.desc: The story of Stanislav E Petrov, a former lieutenant colonel in the Soviet army who, in 1983, averted nuclear war by refusing to launch a retaliatory strike against incoming US missiles - intelligence that turned out to be false. The film combines drama and documentary, with the story of those few tense hours intercut with footage of the real Petrov as he is now. Sergey Shnyryov stars as the young Petrov, with appearances from the likes of Kevin Costner, Walter Cronkite, Robert De Niro, Matt Damon and Ashton Kutcher.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy catches his friend Yancy Tucker stealing two chickens and agonises over whether to report him. With Richard Thomas and Robert Donner.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A forthcoming county fair brings out a streak of competitiveness in the family. Olivia is surprised to hear her childhood sweetheart, the now wealthy Oscar Cockrell, is to be one of the judges. Peter Donat guest stars.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Albert runs away from home, convinced Laura thinks he is trying to steal her father's affection.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mr Olesen begins writing a gossip column, causing considerable local interest and resentment from some quarters. Drama, starring Michael Landon.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd takes in a troublesome teenager whose carelessness jeopardises the safety of the entire Hansen household. Joanie plans on striking up a relationship with her business partner and Jim comes to the rescue of a stray dog. Guest starring Nicky Aycox and Michael Reilly Burke.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd treats a high-school runner, driven to win at any cost, and is courted by the charming son of a Mob boss. Joanie discovers she is a gourmet cook for the animals.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: An aspiring actress just wants to be herself, but her controlling father is determined to maintain control over her public image.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Mark agrees to sell his soul in return for saving a girl's life - but unwittingly allows the Devil to obtain the spirit of an angel.

programme.title: End of Summer
programme.desc: A Victorian artist struggles to repress her romantic feelings for a wealthy suitor, who responds by embarking on a torrid fling with her 18-year-old ward instead. Drama, starring Jacqueline Bisset, Peter Weller, Julian Sands and Amy Locane.

programme.title: She Led Two Lives
programme.desc: A happily married woman who bumps into an old flame while on a teaching position away from home, and promptly decides to get married for a second time. Fact-based drama, starring Connie Sellecca, Perry King and A Martinez.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy needs some peace and quiet to finish writing his book. Ben quits his job at the newspaper and becomes a car salesman, but picks up some dishonest habits.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura and Grace are frustrated that the boys they want to take them to the spring dance are showing no interest, so decide to make them jealous.

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Avenging Ace
programme.desc: The crusading attorney risks his reputation in a bid to clear the name of a high-flying air force pilot wrongly imprisoned for murder. Mystery, starring Barbara Hale, William Katt, Larry Wilcox and Erin Gray.

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Fatal Framing
programme.desc: The attorney is drawn into a world of deception and fraud while investigating the case of a wealthy and reclusive artist. Mystery, starring Raymond Burr, David Soul, John Rhys-Davies and Barbara Hale.

programme.title: Elvis: The Early Years
programme.desc: The first in a two-part biopic of the king of rock 'n' roll, Elvis Presley, charting his humble beginnings in Tupelo, Mississippi, to his recordings at Sun Studios in Memphis and his conscription into the US army. Jonathan Rhys Meyers plays the singer, with Rose McGowan, Camryn Manheim and Randy Quaid.

programme.title: Sleeping with the Enemy
programme.desc: An emotionally abused wife fakes her own death to escape her violent, obsessional husband. She moves to a new town and starts a new life under an assumed identity. However, her brutal spouse realises she is still alive and resolves to hunt her down. Thriller, starring Julia Roberts, Patrick Bergin, Kevin Anderson and Elizabeth Lawrence.

programme.title: House of Secrets
programme.desc: A recently divorced woman called Julie, who left her abusive husband Sam, must figure out who keeps on breaking into her home. Mystery drama, starring Bianca Lawson, Brendan Fehr and Neil Jackson.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Orphan Hobart Shank comes to stay and John-Boy tries to get him a contract as a professional baseball player - but tragedy strikes when he breaks his arm in a fall, destroying his one chance at fame.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Erin finds an orphaned fawn and decides to nurse it back to health, while John-Boy's new job as a rent collector makes him extremely unpopular with the locals. Charles Tyner guest stars, with Richard Thomas.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mary expresses fears over marrying Adam Kendall, as she doubts they could safely raise children together.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Charles and Jonathan plan to show the boys a few things about the responsibilities of adulthood, but the tables are swiftly turned. Drama, starring Michael Landon.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd realises her patient's supposed stomach flu is actually the result of poisoning, while Michael intervenes with the authorities on the clinic's behalf and stops the eviction.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Paul decides to go public about his relationship with Syd, who has her hands full struggling to treat a boy whose symptoms are unaccountably at odds with his blood test.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan intervenes when a factory causes water pollution, but finds the employees unwilling to help, even when their children's health is affected. Paul Walker guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help a minor league baseball team turn around their losing streak, and also come to the aid of an elderly vendor who has been banned from their ground.(n)

programme.title: See Jane Date
programme.desc: A publishing assistant endures a series of romantic misadventures as she tries to find the ideal date to escort her to a family wedding - and impress the former high-school rival who stole her boyfriend. Romantic comedy, starring Charisma Carpenter, Holly Marie Combs, Antonio Sabato Jr and Linda Dano.(n)

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: A woman has an affair with a professional basketball star and challenges him for custody of their mixed-race son. Fact-based drama, starring Jennifer Finnigan, Doug Savant, Roger R Cross and Sonja Bennett.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy has heard nothing from the publisher whom he sent his book, so goes to New York to find out if it is going to be printed.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part one of two. A widow realises she does not have long to live, so asks Charles to find homes for her three children.(n)

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Lady in the Lake
programme.desc: Raymond Burr stars as the ace attorney, whose investigation into the lakeside disappearance of a married heiress leads him to uncover a sinister conspiracy. Murder mystery, with Barbara Hale, William Katt, David Ogden Stiers and David Hasselhoff.(n)

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Murdered Madam
programme.desc: The crusading lawyer comes to the aid of one of his secretary Della's old friends, who has been accused of murdering his wife. As the case unfolds, secrets from the victim's past begin to emerge, and Perry stumbles across a multi-million dollar banking fraud. Courtroom thriller, starring Raymond Burr, Barbara Hale, John Rhys-Davies and Ann Jillian.(n)

programme.title: Elvis: The Early Years
programme.desc: Conclusion of the rock 'n' roll biopic, starring Jonathan Rhys Meyers as the much-loved performer. Following his varied film career and the rise of pop music, Elvis stages a comeback, but his reliance on drugs intensifies as the demands of fame take hold. With Rose McGowan and Randy Quaid.(n)

programme.title: Burlesque
programme.desc: A woman goes to work as a cocktail waitress at a burlesque club which is teetering on the brink of closure. The manager gives her the chance to perform and she has soon become the venue's star attraction, drawing the attention of a sleazy developer with plans for the site. Musical drama, starring Cher, Christina Aguilera, Cam Gigandet and Stanley Tucci.(n)

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: A medical researcher accuses a rival doctor of attacking him with a syringe full of lethal drugs, but when he is later found murdered, the bitter feud between the two medics turns out to be just the tip of the iceberg for DCI Burke and the team. Both men have many enemies, especially after their drug trials resulted in a woman's death, and affairs of the heart muddy the water for the detectives in their search for the real killer. Drama, starring Blythe Duff and Alex Norton.(n)

programme.title: In the Arms of a Killer
programme.desc: A rookie homicide cop lands herself in a dilemma after making the foolish mistake of becoming romantically involved with the prime suspect in a drug-related murder case. Thriller, starring Jaclyn Smith, John Spencer, Michael Nouri, Nina Foch and Sandahl Bergman.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A wealthy widow, Mrs Clayborne, accuses John-Boy of stealing silver antiques while working in her mansion. John needs new truck tyres so hocks his wedding ring to buy them. Richard Thomas stars.

programme.title: Love Means Zero
programme.desc: At 85 years old, Nick Bollettieri is a living legend. At his tennis academy in Florida, he raised a generation of champions. Courier. Seles. Agassi. No other coach has matched his success, his dominance or his fame. His greatness, though, came at a terrible price - broken marriages, financial ruin and a fractured relationship with his surrogate son and most cherished student, Andre Agassi. This documentary tells his story and explores the cost of his all-consuming drive for greatness. Directed and produced by Jason Kohn.

Noah struggles to adjust to his new life after moving to Los Angeles to be closer to his kids. He attempts to reach a gifted but troubled student while under the stern eye of the school's principal. Helen finally discovers the source of her anxiety, only to be blindsided by a new catastrophe. Season premiere.(c)

programme.title: Call Me a Ham
programme.desc: Goldie agrees to a favor for Ron. Arnie warns Edgar that Goldie is onto them. Ralph and Adam approach Dawn with an opportunity. Amanda gets Eddie in hot water. Cassie helps out Nick, a favor she might come to regret.(c)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Matters of Fact
programme.desc: The New York Times reporters learn that the President’s former national security adviser, Michael T. Flynn, has pled guilty to lying to the FBI, bringing the Russia investigation closer to Trump’s inner circle. As the paper leads the reporting on workplace sexual harassment, allegations of past misconduct by one reporter in the bureau bring the story home. And for all the attacks on the free press over the course of Trump’s first year in office, the paper is rewarded for what it does best: good reporting.(c)

programme.title: Hostel
programme.desc: A pair of horny American college students on a backpacking trip across Europe stumble into a hellish nightmare of murder for profit in this horror smash from director Eli Roth ("Cabin Fever"), starring Jay Hernandez and Derek Richardson, with Eythor Gudjonsson, Barbara Nedeljakova, Jan Vlasak, Jana Kaderabkova and Jennifer Lim.

programme.title: The White King
programme.desc: Djata is a 12-year-old growing up in a brutal dictatorship shut off from the outside world. When the government imprisons his father and Djata and his mother are labeled traitors, the boy will not rest until he sees his father again.

programme.title: Push (2009)
programme.desc: A clairvoyant teenager (Dakota Fanning) and a telekinetic fugitive (Chris Evans) team up to find a missing woman who is the key to exposing a sinister, secret government agency that's building a clandestine army of psychic warriors. Djimon Hounsou costars in this sci-fi action thriller.

programme.title: Crimson Tide
programme.desc: In the midst of a global crisis, the USS Alabama receives an unconfirmed order to launch its nuclear missiles - signaling the start of World War III. The tension quickly rises as the sub's respected commander (Gene Hackman) and his brilliant executive officer (Denzel Washington) clash over the validity of their orders, battling each other for control of the sub. Also starring Viggo Mortensen and James Gandolfini.

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: Nadine (Hailee Steinfeld) and Krista (Haley Lu Richardson) are inseparable best friends attempting to navigate high school together, until Nadine's older brother Darian (Blake Jenner) and Krista begin dating. With her view of the world rocked, Nadine is forced to see the people in her life, including her well-meaning but distracted mother (Kyra Sedgwick), and unlikely mentor and History teacher Mr. Bruner (Woody Harrelson), with fresh eyes and new appreciation. She realizes that people - and life - are more complicated than she thought.

programme.title: Dean
programme.desc: Demetri Martin plays an illustrator who falls hard for an LA woman (Gillian Jacobs) while trying to prevent his father (Kevin Kline) from selling the family home in the wake of his mother's death.

programme.title: Office Christmas Party
programme.desc: When the CEO (Jennifer Aniston) of a company tries to close her hard-partying brother's branch, he (T.J. Miller) and his CTO (Jason Bateman) must rally their co-workers and host an epic office Christmas party in an effort to impress a potential client and close a sale that will save their jobs. Also stars Olivia Munn, Vanessa Bayer, Courtney B. Vance, Rob Corddry and Kate McKinnon.

programme.title: Matters of Fact
programme.desc: The New York Times reporters learn that the President’s former national security adviser, Michael T. programme.desc: Captain Jack Sparrow has a blood debt to pay. He owes his soul to the ghastly Davy Jones unless he can cheat death - and eternal damnation - by seizing the fabled Dead Man's Chest. Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom and Keira Knightley star.

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Brief Nudity

programme.title: The Money Issue
programme.desc: The financial reality of supporting his entire family in Los Angeles while earning nothing hits home for Romesh. He goes to some extreme measures to raise money in a short time for an ad campaign for his impending comedy show at The Greek Theater.(c)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Nudity, Strong Sexual Content

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Successful suburbanite commuter Howard Wakefield (Bryan Cranston) takes a perverse detour from family life by vanishing without a trace. Hidden in the attic of his carriage house garage and surviving by scavenging at night, Howard secretly observes the lives of his wife (Jennifer Garner) and children and neighbors. He slowly realizes that he has not left his family, he has left himself.

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: Terrence Howard stars in this rousing true-life story of a Philadelphia swim coach in the mid-1970s who faces racism in trying to land a coaching position, and instead transforms a group of trash-talking inner-city teenagers into a championship squad. Bernie Mac, Kimberly Elise and Tom Arnold costar in this inspiring drama.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: Casey, a young American backpacker in Germany, falls in love with Juliette, a fellow American traveling through Europe. She is diagnosed with a fatal disease, and Casey decides to steal from German gangster Hagen, in order to pay for the medical treatment which could save Juliette's life. Casey's heist doesn't go as planned and Hagen catches him. He manages to escape Hagen's men, steal one of Hagen's cars, and flee. Pursued across Germany, he races to save his own life and get to Juliette before Hagen's men get to her first.

programme.title: Walking Out
programme.desc: Once a year, fourteen-year-old David (Josh Wiggins) travels from his mother's home in Texas to visit his loner father, Cal (Matt Bomer), in the remote mountains of Montana. There, the two embark on their annual hunting excursion, during which the taciturn Cal attempts to connect with his smartphone-addicted son. But when a terrifying turn of events leaves Cal critically wounded, it's up to the teenage David to summon enough strength for both of them.

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: Ben Affleck takes over the role of hero CIA agent Jack Ryan in this box office hit based on the best-selling novel by Tom Clancy. Low-level analyst Ryan is elevated to prominence by his expertise on an obscure strongman (Ciaran Hinds) after the politician's surprising ascendancy to the Russian presidency. But that's just the tip of a very large, very lethal iceberg involving neo-Nazis and a nuclear warhead smuggled into the U.S. by terrorists. Morgan Freeman, Bridget Moynihan and Liev Schreiber costar in this espionage adventure.

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms.

programme.title: Terms of Endearment
programme.desc: Hard-to-please Aurora (Shirley MacLaine) is looking for love, while her daughter (Debra Winger) has her own set of family problems. Also starring Jack Nicholson.

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: Thomas Jane ("Deep Blue Sea," "Dreamcatcher") steps into the steel-tipped boots of Marvel Comics hero Frank Castle, a.k.a. The Punisher, a crusading vigilante out to topple the crime czar (John Travolta) who murdered his family. Rebecca Romijn, Ben Foster, Samantha Mathis, Roy Scheider and Will Patton costar in this crackling adaptation from writer/director Jonathan Hensleigh ("Jumanji," "Armageddon").
